summary: Data Analyst with practical experience in Python, SQL, Excel, and Power BI, specializing in data preprocessing, analysis, and visualization. Hands-on exposure to real-world datasets through internships and simulations, with experience in dashboard creation, reporting, and version control using Git/GitHub. Strong analytical mindset with the ability to translate data into actionable insights and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
key_points: Practical experience in Python, SQL, Excel, and Power BI.
Specializes in data preprocessing, analysis, and visualization.
Experience in dashboard creation, reporting, and version control using Git/GitHub.
Strong analytical mindset with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
Analyzed recruitment and business data to generate actionable insights.
Cleaned, validated, and transformed large datasets.
Created dashboards and MIS reports to track KPIs.
Completed a hands-on job simulation covering real-world data analytics tasks with Accenture.
Assisted in developing a machine learning model for gender and age detection as a Data Science Intern.
Enhanced problem-solving and debugging abilities in web design with React JS.
Skilled in Python, R, SQL, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit learn, Keras, TensorFlow.
Experienced with SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB databases.
Proficient in Tableau, Power BI, and Excel for visualization.
Familiar with Git, GitHub, Jira, Git Bash.
Completed Employability Skills Program - Advanced and Git Training.
Holds a Diploma in Computer Engineering and pursuing a BE in Computer Engineering from Gujarat Technological University.
